job_title: Marketing, Analytics, Tag Manager, Adwords, Conversion, SEA, seo Specialist
job_description:
Allright. Here is what I need now & monthly after:

Help us:

1. Setup our analytics, tag manager with correcly tracking conversions and creating reports with conversion funnels.

2. Check our technical SEO on our pages and improve on Webflow to get the most out of what we currently have.

3. Define SEO & SEA strategy and helps us to keep track of this (manage this proactively)

Monthly:

- SEO report with advices / actionable items, then start executing them if neccasary (could be writing blog posts / creating pages and so on).

- Conversion funnel reports in analytics to understand what marketing channels are most effective.

- Watch inspectlet sessions and see if UX or copywrite can be improved and execute and keep track of metrics to prove improvements.

- Analyze all, spot opportunities and suggest improvements then execute them together with us.

You are in full control of generating higher conversions month by month and all activities neccasary to achieve this.

Responsibilities: Check our technical SEO on our pages and improve on Webflow to get the most out of what we currently have
SEO report with advices / actionable items, then start executing them if neccasary (could be writing blog posts / creating pages and so on)
Conversion funnel reports in analytics to understand what marketing channels are most effective
Watch inspectlet sessions and see if UX or copywrite can be improved and execute and keep track of metrics to prove improvements
You are in full control of generating higher conversions month by month and all activities neccasary to achieve this
